formatted_address: 5 Stadium Walk, #02-36/37/38 Leisure Park Kallang, Singapore 397693
name: FIBARO Singapore

reviews.text: Went in to have a look at their Yale products at Kallang shop. Mall with the least footfall, yet 3 staffs just stuck to their seats and pretended not to notice me. The fourth guy came out of the room and also pretended to be busy. First to post 1st review with 1 star. Let's see if they ever respond and come up with any excuses, like no appointment, no talk. Might as well go set up in an industrial building.
